mdRecord.dcterms:title: Arrestation de Mr. De Launay, gouverneur de la Bastille
Arrest of Mr. De Launay, governor of the Bastille
mdRecord.dcterms:description: In the shadow of a large castle fortress and billowing smoke, a large group of armed men seize another man. Several cannon and ammunition are shown in the foreground and there are a couple of white flags within the crowd
